sentence: The best shot they had of beating Brian Kemp was to get him into a runoff.? Stacey Abrams, who lost to Kemp narrowly in 2018, is running again this year and is considered the putative Democratic nominee.
author: David M. Drucker
title: David Perdue gets clear shot at Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp with Vernon Jones primary exit
